name: Find Amigus!
description:
This is the first game I ever made on my own. Took 5 days to make from scratch, the only things I didn't make it myself are the sounds.

W,A,S,D to move.

E to Interact.

Shift or Space to Walk.

Works with controller too.

The monsters do not see. So, be quiet.

Doors and Keys are always in the same position but with random colors.

Map layout is always the same.

Current Version 1.0.0
